list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor deploy workflow to improve SCP and debugging.
Updated SCP to use a private key for better security and added a command to disable strict host key checking for smoother automation. Improved debugging by including file path outputs for Maven build artifacts. These changes enhance deployment reliability and streamline troubleshooting.

task.summary:
Add logging and URL sanitization functionality
Introduced logging using Log4j to track requests and actions in `UrlController` and `UrlShortServiceImpl`. Added a URL sanitization utility method to ensure all URLs are properly prefixed with "http://" or "https://". Updated generated short URLs to include "redirect" in their structure.

Add rate limiting, IP tracking, and URL enhancements
Integrated Resilience4j for API rate limiting and added client IP tracking in URL encoding requests. Improved URL sanitization and adjusted URL redirection logic. Also included error message handling and updated application properties and dependencies.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for Spring Boot deployment
Introduce an automated deployment workflow using GitHub Actions. This configuration builds the Spring Boot application with Maven and deploys it to a remote VPS. It ensures seamless deployment when changes are pushed to the `main` branch.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for Spring Boot deployment
Introduce an automated deployment workflow using GitHub Actions. This configuration builds the Spring Boot application with Maven and deploys it to a remote VPS. It ensures seamless deployment when changes are pushed to the `main` branch.

Set Java distribution to Temurin in deploy workflow
Updated the GitHub Actions deploy workflow to specify 'temurin' as the Java distribution and set 'check-latest' to false. This ensures consistent builds by explicitly defining the distribution and disabling automatic updates to the latest version.

Set Java distribution to Temurin in deploy workflow
Updated the GitHub Actions deploy workflow to specify 'temurin' as the Java distribution and set 'check-latest' to false. This ensures consistent builds by explicitly defining the distribution and disabling automatic updates to the latest version.

Set Java distribution to Temurin in deploy workflow
Updated the GitHub Actions deploy workflow to use 'temurin' as the Java distribution and set the 'check-latest' option to false. This ensures consistent and reliable builds by explicitly specifying the distribution and avoiding automatic updates to the latest version.

Refactor deploy workflow for enhanced reliability.
Improved the GitHub Actions deploy script by adding better process management, structured logging, and error handling during JAR file deployment and process startup. These changes ensure smoother operations and easier debugging of deployment issues.

Refactor deploy workflow for enhanced reliability.
Improved the GitHub Actions deploy script by adding a Maven dependency cache, structured logging, and error handling during the deployment process. Updated SCP command to use an explicit path and added file listing for better debugging. These changes ensure more robust deployments and easier troubleshooting.

Add file listing to Maven build step in deploy script
Enhanced the deploy workflow by listing build artifacts after the Maven build step to aid in debugging. Updated associated comments and metadata for improved clarity and consistency. These changes contribute to more transparent and robust deployments.

Add file listing to Maven build step in deploy script
Enhanced the deploy workflow by including detailed file listings after the Maven build step for better debugging visibility. Updated metadata and comments to improve clarity and maintain consistency. These changes aim to streamline troubleshooting and ensure more robust deployments.

Add file path output to Maven build step in deploy script
Enhanced the deploy workflow by adding a command to output the exact path of the generated JAR file for better debugging visibility. Updated related metadata and comments to improve clarity and maintain consistency. These changes aim to streamline troubleshooting and strengthen deployment reliability.

Enhance deploy workflow with file path output and SCP step
Added exact file path output for Maven build artifacts to aid debugging. Introduced SCP step for transferring the JAR file to the VPS. These updates improve deployment reliability and streamline troubleshooting.

Enhance deploy workflow with SCP step and file path output
Added a command to disable strict host key checking in SCP to improve automation. Introduced file path output to aid in debugging Maven build artifacts. These updates enhance deployment reliability and streamline troubleshooting.

Refactor deploy workflow to improve SCP and debugging.
Updated SCP to use a private key for better security and added a command to disable strict host key checking for smoother automation. Improved debugging by including file path outputs for Maven build artifacts. These changes enhance deployment reliability and streamline troubleshooting.

MESSAGE.value:
Add logging and URL sanitization functionality
Introduced logging using Log4j to track requests and actions in `UrlController` and `UrlShortServiceImpl`. Added a URL sanitization utility method to ensure all URLs are properly prefixed with "http://" or "https://". Updated generated short URLs to include "redirect" in their structure.

Add rate limiting, IP tracking, and URL enhancements
Integrated Resilience4j for API rate limiting and added client IP tracking in URL encoding requests. Improved URL sanitization and adjusted URL redirection logic. Also included error message handling and updated application properties and dependencies.

Add GitHub Actions workflow for Spring Boot deployment
Introduce an automated deployment workflow using GitHub Actions. This configuration builds the Spring Boot application with Maven and deploys it to a remote VPS. It ensures seamless deployment when changes are pushed to the `main` branch.

Set Java distribution to Temurin in deploy workflow
Updated the GitHub Actions deploy workflow to specify 'temurin' as the Java distribution and set 'check-latest' to false. This ensures consistent builds by explicitly defining the distribution and disabling automatic updates to the latest version.

Set Java distribution to Temurin in deploy workflow
Updated the GitHub Actions deploy workflow to use 'temurin' as the Java distribution and set the 'check-latest' option to false. This ensures consistent and reliable builds by explicitly specifying the distribution and avoiding automatic updates to the latest version.

Improve deploy script for robustness and logging
Enhanced the deploy workflow by adding logging for key steps, handling SCP errors, and introducing a delay after stopping processes. These changes improve reliability and provide better visibility into deployment operations.

Refactor deploy workflow for enhanced reliability.
Improved the GitHub Actions deploy script by adding better process management, structured logging, and error handling during JAR file deployment and process startup. These changes ensure smoother operations and easier debugging of deployment issues.

Updated SCP command to use an explicit path and added file listing for better debugging. These changes ensure more robust deployments and easier troubleshooting.
